name: The Forest Mission
description:
Commander!

The King has given you a task for which you have  to go to the forest.

Be careful ! We don't know what's there in the darkness of the woods . . . .

  The Forest Mission is a short (5 - 10mins) survival-horror game where you have to collect certain  things while keeping an eye out for some mysterious creature.
  • The game is still under development! which means features like selecting difficulty, adjusting  sensitivity etc will be added soon.
  • The game is only available for Windows at this moment. It will be released for other platforms later.
